mapper.select: SELECT id,`name`,remark,RU_QZ_INSPECTION_TYPE ruQzInspectionType from ru_qz_inspection_item T where T.`NAME`->>'$.ZH_CN'=#{zhName} and T.RU_QZ_INSPECTION_TYPE=1
SELECT id,`name`,remark,RU_QZ_INSPECTION_TYPE ruQzInspectionType from ru_qz_inspection_item T where T.`NAME`->>'$.ZH_CN'=#{zhName} and T.RU_QZ_INSPECTION_TYPE=1
